about.para1: As a passionate and dedicated web developer, I thrive on learning, creating, and solving real-world problems through technology. My journey in programming began during high school, and over the years, it has transformed from a hobby into a deep-rooted passion and career pursuit.
about.para2: With a strong command of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and backend technologies like Node.js and MongoDB, I specialize in building dynamic, responsive, and user-centric web applications. My expertise extends to modern frameworks such as React and Bootstrap, enabling me to craft visually appealing and seamless user experiences
about.para3: What sets me apart is my creative mindset and collaborative approach. Whether it's working within a team or directly with clients, I prioritize understanding goals and translating visions into functional and innovative solutions. I value clear communication and ensure that every project reflects excellence and attention to detail.
about.para4: As I advance my journey in web development, I actively seek opportunities to apply my skills in impactful ways. Be it through internships, freelance projects, or collaborative endeavors, I am eager to contribute to organizations that champion innovation, teamwork, and a forward-thinking mindset.
